usage_export_job_id.description: The unique identifier for the usage export job

org_id.description: The unique identifier for the organization

org_slug.description: The slug identifier for the organization

state.description: The current state of the export job

start.description: The start date for the usage export

end.description: The end date for the usage export

download_urls.description: URLs to download the usage data files (only available when state is 'completed')
